name: "Two Thousand and Ten (and Eleven!)" - Gamecock Baseball NCAA Championships - 2 Sizes
description:
Print of my Original Pen and Ink Drawing of the University of South Carolina's flag flying over the South Carolina Capitol building after the Men's Baseball team won the NCAA National Championship.  

The print commemorates the years 2010/11 - 2 years of excellence in Gamecock Athletics (SEC East Football Champions and Men's Basketball victory over Kentucky, Baseball National Championships, etc.!), the enduring faith and devotion of Gamecock fans, and the END of the "chicken curse."  :)  

Each print is signed, numbered, and hand-titled, "Two Thousand and Ten (and Eleven!) Please indicate in your Note to Seller if you would like Print personalized  (i.e. "For John - Go Cocks!) under my signature.  

LARGE Print measures 12" x 18" and comes in a protective plastic sleeve.  SMALL Print measures 8-1/2" x 11" and comes in a protective plastic sleeve.  


Shipping and Handling charge of $6 will be added at checkout (plus $1 for each additional).  Prints will ship USPS Priority Mail.  

Message me if you prefer to come to my studio in Columbia to purchase and pick up!
